  • Live transition is goal: Sept 2025 simplification to 5-payout rule makes path to live account clearer.
  • Payout processing: Generally fast at 24-48 hours once payout conditions are met.

Bottom Line

MyFundedFutures offers three distinct plans for different experience levels. The PRO plan stands out with the industry's largest $100,000 simulated payout cap - making it the premier choice for expert traders seeking maximum earning potential. All plans feature $0 activation and no daily loss limits.

Choose PRO if you're an expert trader seeking maximum earnings ($100k sim payouts - largest in industry) and prefer bi-weekly calendar payouts.

Overview

Tradeify offers three pathways: Lightning Funded (straight to sim funded, no evaluation), Advanced Challenge (static drawdown after passing), and Growth Challenge (EOD trailing drawdown). Lightning accounts uniquely pay 100% of first $15,000 profits to trader, then 90% thereafter. All accounts feature $1,000 minimum payout, 10 trading days required between payouts, and 35% consistency rule. Fast payout processing at 24-48 hours. Maximum 5 sim funded accounts allowed.

Best For

Traders who want to skip evaluations (Lightning), prefer faster access to payouts with generous profit splits, or want to scale to 5 accounts. 100% of first $15k profits makes Lightning accounts extremely attractive.

Account Types Explained

Lightning Funded (Straight to Sim Funded)

Skip the evaluation entirely and start earning immediately. Lightning accounts offer the best profit split in the industry: 100% of first $15,000 profits goes to you, then 90% thereafter. No evaluation phase means no proving period - just start trading. Uses EOD trailing max drawdown. Progressive consistency rule starts at 20% for first payout and increases. Available in $25k, $50k, $100k, $150k sizes.

  • 100% of first $15,000 profits
  • 90% profit split after $15k
  • No evaluation required
  • EOD trailing max drawdown
  • Progressive consistency rule (starts 20%)
  • Minimum $1k payout
  • 10 trading days between payouts
  • Higher upfront cost but immediate access

Advanced Challenge

Traditional evaluation-based account. Once you pass the Advanced challenge, you receive an Advanced Sim Funded account. Key benefit: max drawdown becomes static when liquidation threshold reaches $100 plus initial balance (e.g., $50,100 on 50k plan). This means your drawdown stops trailing once you hit this threshold. 90% profit split on sim funded account.

  • Requires passing evaluation first
  • Static drawdown after reaching threshold
  • 90% profit split
  • 35% consistency rule
  • Minimum $1k payout
  • 10 trading days between payouts
  • Lower upfront cost than Lightning

Growth Challenge

Evaluation-based account with EOD trailing drawdown throughout. After passing Growth challenge, you receive a Growth Sim Funded account where max drawdown becomes static at $100 plus initial balance. EOD trailing means drawdown adjusts daily based on end-of-day balance. Available in $50k, $100k, $150k sizes. 90% profit split on sim funded account.

  • Requires passing evaluation first
  • EOD trailing drawdown during challenge
  • Static drawdown after passing (at threshold)
  • 90% profit split

  • Minimum $1k payout

Key Advantages

✨ What Sets Tradeify Apart
  • Lightning: 100% of first $15k profits - Unmatched in the industry. You keep ALL of the first $15,000 you earn, then 90% thereafter. No other firm offers this.

  • Scale to 5 sim funded accounts - Maximum 5 total accounts (any combination of Lightning, Advanced, Growth). Higher limit than many competitors.
  • Static drawdown after threshold - Advanced/Growth accounts: drawdown stops trailing once you reach $100 above initial balance. More predictable risk management.
  • Multiple payout windows per month - More flexibility in requesting payouts compared to strict bi-weekly-only firms.

Important Considerations

💡 Things to Consider
  1. $1,000 minimum payout - Designed for serious traders building consistent profitability. Works best with larger account sizes.
  2. 10 trading days between payouts - Regular trading cycle ensures sustainable performance. Plan your trading schedule accordingly.
  3. 35% consistency rule - Promotes steady trading habits over boom-bust patterns. Encourages disciplined approach.
  4. Lightning premium pricing - Skip evaluation entirely and keep 100% of first $15k. Investment pays off with faster access and higher initial profits.
  5. Progressive consistency for Lightning - Starts easier (20%) and scales with performance. Gradual structure supports growth.

  • Advanced/Growth accounts: drawdown becomes static at $100 above initial balance (e.g., $50,100 on 50k)

  • Minimum $1,000 payout required

Advanced & Growth Challenge:

  • 35% consistency rule
  • Processing: 24-48 hours

Who Should Choose Tradeify?

Consider alternatives if:

  • You're building toward $1,000 consistency (smaller account sizes may suit you better initially)
  • You prefer more frequent payout cycles (look for weekly options)
  • You're developing consistent trading patterns (consistency rules help build discipline)

Real Trader Insights

Based on community feedback and payout reports:

  • Lightning's 100% first $15k is real: Traders love keeping all initial profits. Makes the higher upfront cost worthwhile for many.
  • Fast payouts are legit: Multiple reports of payout approvals in minutes, funds in bank same day. 24-48 hour processing is accurate.
  • 10-day rule is restrictive: Traders who want faster payout cycles find this frustrating. Must plan around it.
  • $1k minimum filters traders: Smaller accounts struggle to consistently hit $1k. Works better for $100k+ accounts.
  • Consistency rule catches people: 35% rule means one big winning day can delay your payout by weeks until you balance it out.
  • 5 accounts is useful: Traders appreciate ability to scale multiple accounts compared to 2-3 limit at other firms.

Bottom Line

Tradeify offers three distinct pathways with Lightning Funded standing out for its industry-best 100% of first $15,000 profits. Fast payout processing (24-48 hours), ability to scale to 5 accounts, and flexible payout windows are major advantages. However, $1,000 minimum payout, 10 trading days between requests, and 35% consistency rule require careful planning.

Choose Lightning if you want to skip evaluation and keep 100% of first $15k (then 90% after).
